Home.title: It would be fun to track your beloved love/hate feeling over time, right? Now you can
Home.subtitle: Create a page for the person you want to track the mood of, and share the link with them!
Home.disclaimer: No registration required, don't lose your link!

Forms.name: Name

Page.title: Hey {name}!
Page.subtitle: Someone thinks you hate them (or not?). Well, good for you! Track it here.
Page.wantTrack: Want to track someone's mood? Click

setPassword.start: To start tracking, {name} must set a password. This will permit just them to update their scores and see their notes.
setPassword.send: Send this link to them and let them set their password by themselves, don't be a dick!
setPassword.insert: Please insert your password to vote

bottleMessage.message: Someone left a message for you, check it out!

modal.title: Leave a message
modal.description: You can leave a message here for {name}. You can leave one message a time and it lasts for 24 hours only.

bottleMessage.title: Leave a message for {name}

Page.spotifyLogin: Want some music suggestions based on your mood? Login with your Spotify account below
